ðŸ“– Summary: Vibe Draw allows users to create 3D models and worlds from simple 2D sketches. It uses AI to enhance the sketches and transform them into 3D models, which can then be added to a 3D world. The resulting 3D world can be exported in a standard format for use in other tools.
